name: 10! Dice - Fun Math Puzzle
description:
10! Dice is a challenging logical puzzle game without any time limit. It has neither color matching, nor match 3 repetition.

It’s kind of an education improving calculation abilities with brain-boosting dynamics.

10! Dice is different type of puzzle game than you’ve ever seen before. The blocks are the dice, you will be encountered by the numbers just like in sudoku games. We believe, addiction of this popular game will make it an editors’ choice soon. 10! Dice is a strategy game just like chess, as well as being a new sort of domino.

Even if it is categorized as puzzle game, it has a piece of many kinds of games like Action, Adventure, Board, Card, Casual, Educational, Racing and Strategy games. 10! is both a math game and a physics game.

You just drag dice onto the board. Combine dice and make 10 in total on a line, vertically or horizontally. Combos and clearing the board will give you extra points.

Quick mode is highly competitive where your target is getting higher scores and better rank on leaderboard.

Take a journey with adventure mode, you will face a lot of surprises on the way. Improve your skills to beat up the challenges.

10! Features:

• Addictive with its excellent dynamics, controls and gameplay.

• Inspiring graphics and sounds deserve an innovation award.

• Bomb booster, rewind button and rotating dice are useful for handling difficult positions.

• Compete with friends in quick mode and see your rank on leaderboard.

• Do you want more strategy instead? Adventure mode is where you should be.
